name: io.github.shashwatgtm/gtm-alpha-mcp-server
description: Professional GTM (Go-To-Market) consultation using the EPIC framework. Provides strategic guidance for Ecosystem & ABM, Product-Led Growth, Inbound/Outbound Demand Generation, and Community-Led Planning with real backend calculations, 30-day persistence, and progress tracking.

tools.name: gtm_alpha_real_consultation
tools.description: Professional GTM consultation with EPIC framework analysis. Provides strategic recommendations for go-to-market strategy across Ecosystem & ABM, Product-Led Growth, Inbound/Outbound Demand Generation, and Community-Led Planning.

tools.name: epic_progress_tracker
tools.description: Track and monitor progress across EPIC framework dimensions. Provides 30-day persistence for tracking GTM strategy implementation milestones.

tools.name: epic_framework_deep_audit
tools.description: Comprehensive audit of your GTM strategy using the EPIC framework. Analyzes gaps and opportunities across all four strategic pillars.

tools.name: premium_consultation_scheduler
tools.description: Schedule premium consultation sessions for in-depth GTM strategy discussions and personalized guidance.
